D

displayDataReport() - Static method in class AppManager
Method to display some statistics of the app: - Accumulated total of reproductions - Most listened genre of all the platform and of a random consumer user - Most listened category of all the platform and of a random consumer user - Top 5 artists and content creators - Top 10 songs and podcasts - Of each genre, the number of sales and the revenue of those sales - Best seller song
